name: Future Island
desc: A replica of site from the festival Future Island/rockWerchter, This was an assignment early in my first year where we learned how to use basic click events and event-listeners in JavaScript

name: Ailiv
desc: A rebuild of the offical www.Ailiv.be website, a first year exam made with the goal of making 1-1 copy to the best of our abilities, improving where needed and making use of self-made JSON-files, visual shopping cart, and URL Parameters for detail pages. Made with JavaScript

name: She Code Afrika
desc: A alternative version of the She Code Afrika website with the goal of creating a website from wireframes given in the form of A video and images using html and CSS

name: A Digital Agency
desc: A Digital agency website made using eleventy, sass, nunjucks, some JavaScript & learning to work together in 1 github repo with multiple people

name: A light Digital Agency
desc: A Lighter version of a Digital Agency website made using only html & CSS

name: My walking app
desc: A walking app made with eleventy and nunJucks, this was my first assignment with eleventy, sass and nunjucks

name: Gentse Feesten
desc: A rebuild of the official Gentse Feesten website. This was a 1st year exam with the goal of creating a functional 1-1 copy and included URL parameters for filtering and a lot of vanilla JavaScript

name: Arne Quinze
desc: A rebuild of the official Arne Quinze website, This was a 1ste year exam to test our css and ut f the box thinking. Includes filtering and use of api's in JavaScript and special CSS methods

name: Github User Database
desc: A github userbase created with vanilla JavaScript as a exam in my first year, includes the github api to search for users and more, also includes the youtube Api. With the goal of this project being functionality over design

name: A social app made in PHP
desc: A social app made with php and MySql databases, this was my first real experience & website with php, including user management, posts, comments, like, friends/followers

name: Wikimedia
desc: A movie app made in ReactJS, using the 'themoviedb' API, reusable components, search function, Firebase implementation, account management, pagination and more.

name: Diorama
desc: A diorama made in blender and later converted to a website using reactJS + ThreeJs & Animations.

name: Jessy-rent
desc: My latest project is a website I made for a person who started her own rental service. This website is mostly static as of now and is still W.I.P. This page is made with VueJS and common Vue libraries. This was also my first time both hosting and getting a domain set up through amazon AWS. This also has a basic laravel back-end ready
